main_definition: In the context of movies, television shows or plays, 'starring' refers to an actor or performer being prominently featured in a production.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The main actor or lead role
meanings_and_examples.example: In the movie Titanic, Leonardo DiCaprio stars as Jack Dawson.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Featured prominently in a production without necessarily being the main star
meanings_and_examples.example: Samantha Bee starring in her own satirical news show on HULU.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Appearing or highlighted in some capacity, often in advertising or marketing
meanings_and_examples.example: Our product is starring in several popular magazines this month!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to a person who has been given significant recognition or honor
meanings_and_examples.example: The Nobel Peace Prize laureate was honored with a star on the Walk of Fame.
